akas: Your Song Presents Feb-ibig Philippines (English title) (complete title)
akas from release info: Your Song Presents Feb-ibig Philippines (English title) (complete title)

1.title: Open Arms
1.plot: Left without a choice, Tammy (Angelica Panganiban) agrees to a series of disastrous blind dates that still leaves her dateless at the end of the whole ordeal. Just when she has decided to fly solo, however, a stranger, Ralph (Derek Ramsay), rescues her from being mobbed by a bunch of lovey-dovey couples at her high school reunion. Is he the man that she's looking for all this time? Or will Ralph leave her disappointed again and, much worse, broken-hearted?

2.title: Exchange of Hearts
2.plot: Rain (Nikki Gil) is a diva in the industry who is always sent flowers from Buboy (Billy Crawford), an aspiring singer dancer who gives up his dream in order to get a good lease on hard work and loving his job. Coinciding with these two are Camille (Rachelle Ann Go), a rose seller, and Joen ('Gabriel Valenciano'), a balladeer and Rain's boyfriend. Little do they know that the people they are looking for are there all along-the change happens when Rain gets on Buboy's truck to Ilocos and they become great friends and find their social differences in each other and in Camille and Joen.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Rose (Karylle) is a sunshine realty promo girl whose boyfriend dumps her after 4 years. It's only been two weeks after their break up when she finds out that her ex-boyfriend is getting married and she sees the whole proposal. Little does she know that her ex's fianc√©e is actually the sister of her college classmate and rival, Arnold (Christian Bautista. So when Rose hallucinates on the road after getting drunk, Arnold is the one to see her and take care of her. They make a deal to try and sabotage the relationship between Arnold's sister, Aleli (Dimples Romana), and her ex-bf, Nikos (Ron Morales), but little do they...

4.title: Houseband
4.plot: Teddy (Zanjoe Marudo), an OFW who got retrenched because of the global economic crisis. He returns home to his family frustrated because he is unable to be a good provider for them. Two years pass and still he fails to find a new job. Ellese (Mariel Rodriguez), the wife of Teddy. Since her husband remains unemployed, Ellese had no other choice but to find work so she can support their young son. As Ellese becomes busy as the breadwinner of the family, Teddy stays at home to take care of their son and do all the household chores. But acting as the 'house husband' eventually makes Teddy feel even ...
